{"id":466722159,"lang":"python3","time":"1 year, 5 months","timestamp":1615526457,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"56 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/466722159/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Add Two Numbers","memory":"14.4 MB","code":"# Definition for singly-linked list.\n# class ListNode:\n#     def __init__(self, val=0, next=None):\n#         self.val = val\n#         self.next = next\nclass Solution:\n    def addTwoNumbers(self, l1: ListNode, l2: ListNode) -> ListNode:\n        result = ListNode(0)\n        r_tail = result\n        carry = 0\n        \n        while l1 or l2 or carry:\n            val1 = (l1.val if l1 else 0)\n            val2 = (l2.val if l2 else 0)\n            carry,out = divmod(val1+val2+carry,10)\n            r_tail.next = ListNode(out)\n            r_tail =r_tail.next\n            l1= (l1.next if l1 else None)\n            l2= (l2.next if l2 else None)\n        return result.next","compare_result":"","title_slug":"add-two-numbers"}
